name: MIS Adjudication Statistics Report
description: ADJ0010 - v00.00.03 Last Modified: 12/01/2017 This report provides Adjudication statistics for the adjudication establishment,  a list of the relevant Prisoners and their outcomes. and also those Prisoners in the current establishment that have outstanding Adjudications i.e. that have not had a hearing date set.

dataset.name: Adjudications
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT * AS NOMS_NUMBER FROM (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_CODE, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.DESCRIPTION, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE, AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.STATUS, AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.CODE, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK, AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE.CODE, AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.FINDING_CODE, AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_INCIDENT_ID, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12), AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT TRIM(DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK || ' ' || DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.PARTY_SEQ_NK)), COUNT(DISTINCT TRIM(DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK || ' ' || DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.CHARGE_SEQ_NK)) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB, BODIMIS.DIM_OIC_OFFENCE AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT a.oic_incident_id, c.offender_booking_sk, c.agency_incident_id_nk, c.charge_seq_nk, c.oic_offence_sk, a.oic_hearing_id_nk, a.party_seq_nk, a.establishment_sk, c.report_date, a.oic_hearing_type, a.notification_charge_date_sk FROM bodimis.fact_incident_charge c LEFT OUTER JOIN bodimis.fact_offender_adjudication a ON c.agency_incident_id_nk = a.agency_incident_id_nk AND c.offender_booking_sk = a.offender_booking_sk) DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_SK = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_OFFENCE_SK) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+) = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.CHARGE_SEQ_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.CHARGE_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK = BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.OIC_HEARING_ID (+) AND AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.RESULT_SEQ_NK = BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.RESULT_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE.CODE (+) = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_TYPE) AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'OIC_HEAR') AND (AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.CODE (+) = BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.OIC_SANCTION_CODE) AND (AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'OIC_SANCT') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('30-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('05-04-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All'))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_CODE, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.DESCRIPTION, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE, AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.STATUS, AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.CODE, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK, AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE.CODE, AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.FINDING_CODE, AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_INCIDENT_ID, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12), AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION) _query0 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_CODE, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.DESCRIPTION, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE, AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.STATUS, AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.CODE, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK, AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE.CODE, AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.FINDING_CODE, AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_INCIDENT_ID, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12), AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT TRIM(AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK || ' ' || AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.RESULT_SEQ_NK)) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB, BODIMIS.DIM_OIC_OFFENCE AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT a.oic_incident_id, c.offender_booking_sk, c.agency_incident_id_nk, c.charge_seq_nk, c.oic_offence_sk, a.oic_hearing_id_nk, a.party_seq_nk, a.establishment_sk, c.report_date, a.oic_hearing_type, a.notification_charge_date_sk FROM bodimis.fact_incident_charge c LEFT OUTER JOIN bodimis.fact_offender_adjudication a ON c.agency_incident_id_nk = a.agency_incident_id_nk AND c.offender_booking_sk = a.offender_booking_sk) DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_SK = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_OFFENCE_SK) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+) = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.CHARGE_SEQ_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.CHARGE_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK = BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.OIC_HEARING_ID (+) AND AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.RESULT_SEQ_NK = BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.RESULT_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE.CODE (+) = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_TYPE) AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'OIC_HEAR') AND (AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.CODE (+) = BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.OIC_SANCTION_CODE) AND (AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'OIC_SANCT') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('30-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('05-04-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All'))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_CODE, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.DESCRIPTION, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE, AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.STATUS, AT_INCIDENT_SANCTION.CODE, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK, AT_ADJUDICATION_HEARING_TYPE.CODE, AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.FINDING_CODE, AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_INCIDENT_ID, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12), AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION) _query1 ON _query0.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = _query1.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT NOMS_NUMBER, COUNT(OIC_INCIDENT_ID) AS COUNT_OIC_INCIDENT_ID, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'PROVED' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_PROVEN_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'S' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_SUSPENDED_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'D' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_DISMISSED_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'NOT_PROCEED' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_NOT_PROCEEDED_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'DISMISSED' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_DISCHARGED_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'REF_POLICE' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_REF_POLICE_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'PROSECUTED' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_PROSECUTED_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'QUASHED' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_QUASHED_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'APPEAL' THEN COUNT_OF_VERDICTS END AS V_COUNT_APPEAL_VERDICTS, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'CC' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_CC, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'ADA' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_ADA, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'FORFEIT' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_FORFEIT, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'OTHER' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_OTHER, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'STOP_PCT' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_STOP_PCT, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'STOP_EARN' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_STOP_EARN, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'CAUTION' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_CAUTION, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'REMACT' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_STOP_REMACT, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'REMWIN' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_STOP_REMWIN, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'EXTW' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_STOP_EXTW, CASE WHEN SANCTION_CODE = 'EXTRA_WORK' THEN COUNT_OF_SANCTIONS END AS V_COUNT_SANCTION_STOP_EXTRA_32, CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'NOT_PROCEED' THEN 'NOT PROCEED' ELSE CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'D' THEN 'DISMISSED' ELSE CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'S' THEN 'SUSPENDED' ELSE CASE WHEN HEARING_FINDING = 'DISMISSED' THEN 'DISCHARGED' ELSE HEARING_FINDING END END END END AS V_HEARING_FINDING FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Outstanding Adj
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK AS ADJUDICATION_ESTABLISHMENT_C31, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB, BODIMIS.DIM_OIC_OFFENCE AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT a.oic_incident_id, c.offender_booking_sk, c.agency_incident_id_nk, c.charge_seq_nk, c.oic_offence_sk, a.oic_hearing_id_nk, a.party_seq_nk, a.establishment_sk, c.report_date, a.oic_hearing_type, a.notification_charge_date_sk FROM bodimis.fact_incident_charge c LEFT OUTER JOIN bodimis.fact_offender_adjudication a ON c.agency_incident_id_nk = a.agency_incident_id_nk AND c.offender_booking_sk = a.offender_booking_sk) DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_SK = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_OFFENCE_SK) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+) = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('30-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('05-04-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK, REPORT_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ADJUDICATION_ESTABLISHMENT_C31, OIC_OFFENCE_CODE, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_HEARING_FINDING
field.legacySql: =If([Hearing Finding] = "NOT_PROCEED"; "NOT PROCEED"; If([Hearing Finding] = "D"; "DISMISSED";If([Hearing Finding] = "S"; "SUSPENDED";If([Hearing Finding] = "DISMISSED"; "DISCHARGED"; [Hearing Finding]))))

field.name: $ref:V_HEARING_FINDING
field.legacySql: =If([Hearing Finding] = "NOT_PROCEED"; "NOT PROCEED"; If([Hearing Finding] = "D"; "DISMISSED";If([Hearing Finding] = "S"; "SUSPENDED";If([Hearing Finding] = "DISMISSED"; "DISCHARGED"; [Hearing Finding]))))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (V_HEARING_NOT_POP = 1 AND V_NO_EST = 0))

errors.error: Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
